programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Second son Zhong (Ekin Cheng), returning from abroad, brings his close girlfriend Xi (Chan Miu-ying), shattering Mei's (Chen Songling) dream of him. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). At her new workplace, Wai-ting meets animal communicator Wong Sing-yan (Chow Ka Lok). The duo often quarrel due to their different values regarding pets. In an accident, Sing-yan acquires skills for communicating with Donut, and a man and a dog gradually build a friendship and help each other. Sing-yan learns from Donut that Wai-ting has some love issues, so he helps her decipher her conundrum. The duo's relationship improves, and they gradually like each other. However, they do not have feelings of affection due to their age difference. Donut wants to play matchmaker for the duo, but it gets into hilarious situations. And its ideas even backfire. programme.desc: With CE Yeung Yat-to (Kwok Chun On) and Deputy CE Tong Ming (Kenneth Ma) at the helm of the leading public health institution Marshall Paxton Hospital, core departments, namely neurosurgery, CTS and A&E, are writing life-saving medical stories. The failed medical reform plan had not in any way frustrated Yat-to, who puts forward Comprehensive Opening Up of the Drug Formulary Bill with the aim of providing low-cost medications to rare disease patients. However, oncologist Ip Ching (Nancy Wu) objects to his proposal, and she even goes against Yat-to as she is appointed as MarsPax CE. Meanwhile, former W.M.U. member Lee Man-shun (Moses Chan) joins the MarsPax team and collaborates with A&E Dr Zoe So (Natalie Tong), neurosurgeon Lui Oi-ling (Kelly Cheung) and other white knights in handling all kinds of critical situations.

programme.title: Defected, The
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.desc: With CE Yeung Yat-to (Kwok Chun On) and Deputy CE Tong Ming (Kenneth Ma) at the helm of the leading public health institution Marshall Paxton Hospital, core departments, namely neurosurgery, CTS and A&E, are writing life-saving medical stories. The failed medical reform plan had not in any way frustrated Yat-to, who puts forward Comprehensive Opening Up of the Drug Formulary Bill with the aim of providing low-cost medications to rare disease patients. However, oncologist Ip Ching (Nancy Wu) objects to his proposal, and she even goes against Yat-to as she is appointed as MarsPax CE. Meanwhile, former W.M.U. member Lee Man-shun (Moses Chan) joins the MarsPax team and collaborates with A&E Dr Zoe So (Natalie Tong), neurosurgeon Lui Oi-ling (Kelly Cheung) and other white knights in handling all kinds of critical situations.

After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Knot To Treasure
programme.desc: Wei (Zhu Jiang), the eldest son of Wei (Chen Jiewen), is wild and untamed. Under family pressure, he finally marries Shan (Zhang Fengni), with whom he has been dating for many years. After their marriage, Yat-sen develops an extramarital affair with Yan (Cui Jiabao), eventually living with her and abandoning Shan. Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Second son Zhong (Ekin Cheng), returning from abroad, brings his close girlfriend Xi (Chan Miu-ying), shattering Mei's (Chen Songling) dream of him. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). However, under her father's strict control, she dares not reveal her relationship with Tung. Can each of them fulfill their dreams and find a good home?

programme.title: Defected, The
programme.desc: Inspector Sheung-bang of the Crime Squad was once a rising star in the police force. While trying to save a colleague, he was shot by a gangster, his life forever changed. After his miraculous survival, Sheung-bang pursues his case with even greater resolve, earning him the nickname "Iron Detective," though he constantly suffers from the aftereffects. Chief Superintendent Wan Hei-wah, ambitious and poised to become the force's first "Top Lady," is shot and wounded by none other than Hei-wah's undercover agent, Yau Ping-ko. Bing-ko, driven by his unwavering resolve, is surprised when Hei-wah breaks his promise. In a fit of rage, Bing-ko accidentally injures Sheung-bang, a move filled with remorse and a secretive effort to help Sheung-bang solve the case as compensation. A power struggle turns Sheung-bang and Bing-ko into pawns, but thanks to the help of Chief Superintendent Cheng Yu-sum, he vows to put an end to the power struggle!

programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the â€œSanfuâ€� herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

Brought to Earth by evil genius Rasputin (Karel Roden) to aid the Nazis in their dying cause, Hellboy (Ron Perlman) was rescued by Professor Broom (John Hurt), founder of the clandestine B.P.R.D. (Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense), who raised him and developed his extraordinary paranormal gifts. Despite his dark origins, Hellboy becomes an unlikely champion for good, battling the evil forces that threaten our world along with a telepathic â€œmer-manâ€� (Doug Jones) and a â€œpyro-kineticâ€� (Selma Blair). Hidden from the society they are assigned to protect, they are the key line of defense against Rasputin, who seeks to reclaim Hellboy to the dark side and use his powers to bring about Armageddon.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline 2006
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the â€œSanfuâ€� herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

programme.title: News Treasury 2025
programme.desc: As the saying goes, "Today's news is tomorrow's history." With so much news every day, it's hard for everyone to take it all in, let alone look back at history. History is a treasure troveâ€”if we ignore or underestimate it, we might miss out on its riches. The new program "News Treasure Hunt" guides viewers to uncover news gems from this vault. In addition to special features, live broadcasts, and series reports from the past, the show offers never-before-seen precious footage. Audiences will have the chance to revisit events such as Bruce Lee's funeral, the Bank of Po Sang robbery, the Gang of Four trial, the Queen's visit to Hong Kong, taxi strikes, the signing of the Sino-British Joint Declaration, an exclusive interview with Margaret Thatcher, Vietnamese refugees, the death of Governor Youde, Chris Patten's arrival in Hong Kong, the closure of Kai Tak Airport, the passing of Deng Xiaoping, the 1997 Handover Ceremony, the China Airlines Hong Kong crash, and SARS press conferences.

programme.title: Shades of Life
programme.desc: Ko Ba-dou (Yu Yang), a retired school principal with a deep love for traditional Chinese culture, values family ethics and is highly respected by his family. His eldest son, Ko Ho-pan (Wu Nuoyan), a journalism graduate and magazine editor, is a prodigy who seeks to get to the bottom of things. On livelihood issues, he occasionally disagrees with his father, holding different views. Ba-dou and his 40-year-old daughter, Ko Ho-yan (Tam Hoi-kei), face a significant generation gap and struggle to keep up with the ever-changing internet age. Fortunately, his daughter-in-law, Tung Oi-ching (Yiu Chi-ling), manages the household with impeccable organization and is a dedicated supporter of her husband and children.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

Later, realizing Yan's overly open attitude towards relationships, he decides to pursue Shan again. Shadowed by her parents' divorce, Xi eventually breaks up with Zhong. Meanwhile, Mei regains her confidence and charm. Zhong begins to admire Mei, but Mei has already joined her good friend Hao (Louis Koo). Youngest daughter Tung (Lam Chi-kwan), a bright and clever girl, marries the promising young man Tung (Wong Kai-tak). programme.desc: JESS, JOEY and JINX go to the Whispering Woods in the hope of seeing some butterflies, but the puppies are so lively and noisy that they frighten them away. JESS wonders â€œhow can we hide to watch butterflies?â€� That's the Big Question! JESS decides to make somewhere to hide out of natural materials. The puppies and Jess try to build a hide out of stones but they're too heavy and all fall down. Jess thinks that something lighter might work well but when they try to build a hide out of straw it's TOO light and flies away in the wind. JESS is stuck - there must be some other material on Greendale Farm they could use. But all that's around them are trees. Jess works out that trees are made out of wood and there are lots of old wooden apple crates in Willow's Stable which will do the job perfectly. JESS, JOEY and JINX build a butterfly hide out of wooden apple crates and soon see lots and lots of beautiful butterflies. Yippety yay!

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's a snowy day on Greendale Farm so Jess and his friends have a race down Cherry Hill. Jess wants to win the race but he can't run as fast in the snow. â€œHow can I go faster than Joey and Jinx?â€� Thinks Jess. That's the Big Question. First, Jess tries rolling down the hill like the puppies but he's not a good roller so that doesn't work. Horace shows Jess how he slides down his slide in the pond. Jess tries again at Cherry Hill but can't get going. Helped by Billie and Baa he remembers everything that Horace did - pushing off, going 'Wheeeee! and lifting his legs up - but nothing works; he ends up sitting in the snow and not sliding at all. He needs something that will move on its own like Mimi's trolley! Jess tries sliding down the hill on the trolley but the wheels get stuck in the snow. Jess decides to take the wheels off and see if the trolley moves faster. Jess whizzes down the hill on the trolley top much faster than the rolling puppies. It's brilliant fun and he's answered the question. Yippety Ya

programme.title: Guess with Jess
programme.desc: It's Harvest time and Jess and his friends are having a special harvest breakfast. But all there is to eat is grass! Jess wonders, â€œWhat shall we have for our harvest breakfast?â€� That's the Big Question! Baa likes juicy things to eat. Jess remembers that he saw some juicy blackberries on his way to Buttercup Meadow. He and Baa go and pick some. They taste delicious, but it's still not quite perfect. Billie wants something crunchy. Jess remembers seeing some crunchy hazelnuts on the way to the blackberries. He and Billie go and collect some hazelnuts. Juicy and crunchy is fantastic, but it's still not perfect. â€œWhat about something chewyâ€� suggests Willow. Jess remembers that he and Billie found some chewy oats on their way to the hazelnut tree. So he and Willow fetch some oats. It's tasty but it's still a bit dry - until Jess adds the final touch - some milk. Perfect! They've made delicious juicy-crunchy-chewy-mushy muesli! And what's more, Jess has answered his Big Question. Yippety Yay!

Fabio memberikan anak perempuannya yang berusia sembilan tahun, Cataleya, kad memori komputer SmartMedia yang dimuatkan dengan maklumat mengenai perniagaan Don Luis dan memberitahunya itu adalah "pasport"nya; dia juga memberikan alamat bapa saudaranya Emilio di Chicago, yang akan menjaganya. Akhirnya, dia meninggalkannya dengan kalung orkid cataleya ibunya. Selepas Fabio dan isterinya Alicia ditembak mati, Cataleya melarikan diri dan mencari suaka di Kedutaan A.S. Dia diberikan laluan ke Amerika Syarikat selepas menyerahkan kad memori kepada kakitangan kedutaan. Walaupun pegawai Amerika cuba memindahkannya ke dalam sistem jagaan angkat, Cataleya menjejaki bapa saudaranya di Chicago dan memintanya melatihnya sebagai pembunuh.

The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: Mary Berry Makes It Easy
programme.desc: Jordan North has more will than skill when cooking, so he joins Mary for some simple recipes to impress his pals, and as a thank you takes her to the pub for a pint and game of darts.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: The Minibods have unexpected problems! Jeff meets a messy guest & Lulu finds a mysterious egg that cracks!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester decide to trick feuding magicians "Shouty Shirt & Abrakapants" into doing their act one last time. Diamondo is holding a mystery dinner party, but Best and Bester solve a real mystery that is not part of the game.

programme.title: GIRLS ONLY
programme.desc: Rancangan GIRLS ONLY merupakan sebuah rancangan khas untuk wanita. Untuk episod kali ini, Girls Only akan membawa penonton ke Galeri Animal Malaysia, membuat analisis warna peribadi di Powderuum dan berborak besama Nana Mahazan.

programme.title: Bella & Jamie
programme.desc: Bella dan Jamie telah berkawan sejak kecil. Ketika mereka mengetahui bahawa ibu Bella dan bapa Jamie bakal berkahwin, hubungan mereka bertukar dari sahabat biasa kepada adik-beradik tiri. Namun persahabatan itu diuji apabila Jamie tahu bahawa Bella menjalin hubungan dengan bekas kekasih Jamie, Reza. Jamie merasa dikhianati dan memutuskan persahabatan serta berusaha menggagalkan perkahwinan ibu bapanya, lantas Bella dan Reza perlu bekerjasama untuk menyelesaikan konflik itu sekali lagi.

programme.title: Sembunyi: Amukan Azazil
programme.desc: Aishah, seorang wanita muda zaman penjajahan Jepun, terbangun di sebuah kampung sunyi yang kelihatan tidak terjejas oleh perang. Dia menemui rahsia gelap kampung itu serta makhluk jahat bernama Azazil yang memburu penduduk.

programme.title: LIVE : SELAMAT PAGI MALAYSIA
programme.desc: Bersama-sama pengacara membincangkan isu-isu terkini dalam Selamat Pagi Malaysia.

programme.title: Abus
programme.desc: Animasi tentang sebuah komuniti Abus yang mempunyai unsur hiburan dan pengajaran yang menerapkan nilai- nilai murni untuk membentuk perpaduan negara.

programme.title: JIKA MASIH ADA RINDU
programme.desc: Sedarlah Hisham kenapa Wahida bersikap dingin padanya. Semakin banyak memori datang membuatkan Hisham kecewa pada dirinya sendiri. Wahida pulang ke rumah ibunya yang terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: SUKSES STPM 2025 SEMESTER 1
programme.desc: Episod ini menyediakan perkongsian teknik menjawab soalan bagi kertas peperiksaan Sijil Tinggi Pelajaran Malaysia (STPM) dengan fokus utama slot ini adalah untuk memberi pendedahan kepada murid tentang bentuk soalan dan teknik menjawab soalan.

programme.title: MOVE IT!
programme.desc: Episod ini meneruskan permainan di Waterloo di mana pertandingan adalah antara pasukan Artis dan pasukan Rahman. Pasukan Artis terdiri daripada dua hos dan tiga lagi pemain. Pada akhirnya pasukan Rahman menang dengan keputusan 12:4.

programme.title: TANYALAH USTAZ (2025/2026) (WEEKDAY)
programme.desc: TANYALAH USTAZ (2025/2026) (WEEKDAY)

programme.title: Doa
programme.desc: Episod ini akan membincangkan doa mengenai â€œDoa Mula Berniaga dan Berkerjaâ€�. Doa akan membicarakan mengenai doa-doa yang dapat kita gunakan dalam seharian kita bukan sahaja doa selepas solat tetapi solat yang boleh kita amalkan agar terselamat di dunia dan akhirat.

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: Saleha
programme.desc: Saleha mengisahkan seorang gadis baik hati yang ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya dan dibesarkan oleh nenek. Selepas diculik dan kehilangan neneknya, dia dipersalahkan dan dihalau oleh keluarganya. Dengan semangat dan keimanan yang teguh, Saleha memulakan hidup baru di Jakarta sambil menyembunyikan penyakit serius.

programme.title: PHOENIX WEATHER FORECAST
programme.desc: Phoenix's engaging young presenter tracks weather movements and forecasts upcoming conditions in her upbeat, lively presentation coupled with music, folklore and traditional wisdom pertaining to different weather conditions in various times of the year, making Weather Forecast a true delight regardless of rain or shine.

programme.title: Savarakathi
programme.desc: A barber, forced by his wife to a family crisis, dodges a violent gangster through a chaotic day, learning that knives should sever bonds, not harm.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well
programme.desc: The Emerald Apple Festival is back and so is a mysterious wish from the town's festive past. Daniel and Paula revive the traditional apple cart race.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls
programme.desc: Lindsey Vonn joins Bear on the French island of Corsica, where they rappel down a rock wall, use a spear gun, swim and dine on sea urchins.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway and Alex row out into the bay to get a closer look at a baby whale. But a storm blows the rowboat towards the sea. Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions
programme.desc: Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.
